data.title: Kalray Reports Voting Rights and Share Capital Status
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Kalray SA ( (FR:ALKAL) ) just unveiled an update.

Kalray announced the total number of voting rights and shares composing its capital as of January 31, 2025, with no new shares issued during that month. The company maintains a strong position in the semiconductor industry, focusing on innovative data processing solutions, without any changes to shareholder voting rights structure.

More about Kalray SA

Kalray is a fabless semiconductor company specializing in intelligent data processing at both Cloud and Edge levels. Utilizing its unique manycore architecture, Kalray provides processors, acceleration cards, and complete systems to optimize data handling in sectors like data centers, 5G, AI, and autonomous vehicles. Founded as a CEA spin-off in 2008, it is backed by investors such as Alliance Venture and Safran.

YTD Price Performance: -28.64%

Average Trading Volume: 2,124

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Buy

Current Market Cap: €7.05M

data.description:

BOKU ( (GB:BOKU) ) has provided an update.

Boku, Inc. has announced a change in the distribution of voting rights due to an event, with Vitruvian Partners LLP now holding 9% of total voting rights through its management of both Build Lux Holdco S.à r.l. and DS Partners LP. This announcement may impact Boku’s stakeholder dynamics as Vitruvian Partners LLP increases its influence over company decisions, potentially affecting strategic directions and governance.

More about BOKU

Boku, Inc. operates in the mobile payments industry, providing services that enable mobile billing and payment solutions. The company focuses on facilitating transactions via mobile devices, catering to a global market that includes major corporations and digital platforms.

data.description:

Petards ( (GB:PEG) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Petards Group PLC announced that its Chairman, Raschid Abdullah, has acquired 200,000 ordinary shares of the company, increasing his total holdings to approximately 6.06% of the company’s issued share capital. This transaction, conducted on the London Stock Exchange, reflects Abdullah’s confidence in the company’s prospects and may impact investor perception positively, potentially strengthening Petards’ position in the security and surveillance industry.

More about Petards

Petards Group PLC is a company that specializes in the development of advanced security, communication, and surveillance systems. The company is listed on the AIM market and focuses on providing cutting-edge technology solutions for various industries requiring enhanced security measures.

data.title: Baronsmead Venture Trust Closes Early Subscription Incentive Due to Full Subscription
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An update from Baronsmead Venture ( (GB:BVT) ) is now available.

Baronsmead Venture Trust plc, in collaboration with Baronsmead Second Venture Trust plc, has initiated a prospectus for subscription offers aiming to raise up to £30 million initially, with a potential additional £20 million through an over-allotment facility. The early subscription incentive, which offered discounts on offer costs for investments up to £7.5 million, has now been fully subscribed, ceasing further discounts under this incentive for Baronsmead Venture Trust, while still available for Baronsmead Second Venture Trust as it hasn’t reached the £7.5 million threshold.

More about Baronsmead Venture

IG Design ( (GB:IGR) ) just unveiled an announcement.

IG Design Group PLC has announced that FIL Limited has increased its holdings in the company, now controlling 14.6849% of voting rights through shares and financial instruments. This acquisition reflects an increase from a previous position of 12.1101%, highlighting FIL Limited’s growing influence and interest in IG Design Group’s operations, potentially impacting the company’s strategic decisions and shareholder dynamics.

IG Design Group PLC is a UK-based company operating in the design industry. The company is known for its production and distribution of diverse design-led products, mainly focusing on gift packaging, greeting cards, stationery, and creative play products for various markets.

data.title: Jim Mellon Increases Stake in Agronomics Limited
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Agronomics Limited ( (GB:ANIC) ) has shared an update.

Agronomics Limited announced that Jim Mellon, its Executive Chair, through his wholly owned company Galloway Limited, purchased 1,300,000 shares at 3.80 pence per share. This transaction increases Mellon’s stake in the company to 15.89% of the total issued capital, with a substantial portion held indirectly through Galloway Limited. This move signals confidence in the company’s strategic direction and could influence market perceptions and investor sentiment regarding Agronomics’ ongoing initiatives in the clean food industry.

More about Agronomics Limited

Agronomics Limited is a leading London-listed company focusing on investment opportunities within the field of clean food. It has established a portfolio of over 20 companies in this rapidly advancing sector, investing in technologies with defensible intellectual property aimed at creating sustainable food and materials. The company’s efforts are geared towards improving food security, human health, animal welfare, and environmental sustainability by decoupling supply chains from traditional agriculture.

data.title: De La Rue Initiates Formal Sale Process Amid Acquisition Interest
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

De La Rue ( (GB:DLAR) ) has provided an announcement.

De La Rue has announced the commencement of a Formal Sale Process following several preliminary cash offers for the company, including a conditional offer from PSFC Entities. The company’s Board has decided to explore these offers by initiating a structured sale process, which involves inviting expressions of interest from potential buyers. This move comes amid ongoing discussions about selling its Authentication division and exploring strategic options for its Currency division, signaling a significant strategic shift that could impact its future operations and stakeholder interests.

More about De La Rue

De La Rue is a company operating in the security printing and papermaking industry, best known for its production of banknotes, passports, and secure product authentication services. It focuses on providing secure and efficient solutions to governments and financial institutions globally.
